text: Garner garnered (ha) attention at the awards ceremony when, during enthusiastic applause, she gave a stunned look and stopped clapping. The reaction became a meme, as these things do, and the public began speculating why Garner looked so upset. One theory involved Garner realizing that Caleb Landry Jones is a provocative and brilliant creative force. (Disclosure: That was my theory.) Another involved Garner realizing she'd forgotten to take the chicken out to thaw.
authors: Jennifer Garner Doesnt Know What Her Oscar Face Meant
title: That Oscars Meme Made Jennifer Garner Want To Punch Something

meta_data.title: Jennifer Garner Doesnt Know What Her Oscar Face Meant
meta_data.description: Garner is just as clueless as we are. "I wish I had a better story," she told Ellen Degeneres.
